mapper.insert: INSERT INTO q_virtual_capital_small( qcoinid, qamount, qtype, qcreatetime, tx_time, qrechargeaddress, quniquenumber, qsource, qnonce, qplatform )VALUES( #{qcoinid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{qamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{qtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{qcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{txTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{qrechargeaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quniquenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qsource,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{qnonce,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{qplatform,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
